entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning then becoming light this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
